archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.3.3a: a) removing unnecessary sensitive information from programs (e.g. authentication details or encryption/API keys in developers' comments) prior to deploying them in the live environment
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
